channel.title: Fixed on Braden Simpson
channel.description: Recent content in Fixed on Braden Simpson

item.title: about
item.description:
I’m a product focused software developer with a passion for building startups. I love creating things that people enjoy using.

I’ve co-founded Leanpub and Riipen, and am currently working at Leanpub.

I casually develop in games, productivity software and vim-related tooling.
